resources.string: Learn to share this tool with anyone
Practice using as many tips as you need to feel confident sharing this tool with others.
On select screens, you\'ll see a variety of icons. Press the icon to reveal a tip that will help you talk about the content of the screen.
"For the screens with no tips, we recommend reading through the content and discussing as needed. "
When a tip lights up, youâ€™ve completed that piece of training. You do not need to use every tip in every conversation.
